alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 11:55AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette, Taylor and Madison Counties through 100 PM EST... At 1155 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blue Springs to 13 miles northwest of Perry to 29 miles northwest of Steinhatchee to 30 miles southeast of St. Marks. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Madison, Perry, Greenville, Lee, Pinland, Ebb, Hamburg, Buckville, Pinetta, Eridu, Grady, Foley, Hanson, Perry-Foley Airport, San Pedro Junction, Hampton Springs, Sirmans, Shady Grove and Cooks Hammock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EST for Big Bend of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison
